text: Approval for a design modification to the intrastent doublestrut stent system.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name visi-pro balloon-expandable peripheral stent system and is indicated for improving luminal diameter in patients with atherosclerotic disease of the common and/or external iliac arteries up to 100 mm in length, witha reference vessel diameter of 5 to 10 mm.
